lead_paragraph: Mr. Smith charges that the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration has “altered temperature data to try to refute an 18-year plateau in global temperatures.”

headline.main: Rep. Lamar Smith Questions Agency’s Revised Climate Data
headline.print_headline: Congressman Doubts Agency’s Revised Climate Data

snippet: Mr. Smith charges that the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration has “altered temperature data to try to refute an 18-year plateau in global temperatures.”
